title: Remove hero stats for experience and projects completed

requirements.summary: Remove the Experience and Projects Completed hero stats while keeping the hero layout balanced across breakpoints.
acceptanceCriteria: The homepage hero no longer displays the labels "Experience" or "Completed" (nor the paired stats such as "5+" years and "50+" projects).
Hero section layout remains visually balanced on mobile and desktop after the stats removal (no awkward empty spacing or misalignment).
No other marketing sections (Services, Process, FAQ, Contact), header, or footer content is removed or changed unintentionally.

file_operations.description: Remove the hero metrics/stats block that shows "Years / Experience" and "Projects / Completed" (including their numeric badges), and adjust surrounding spacing/classes as needed so the hero content remains visually balanced on mobile and desktop.
